Lets just remove the boarders. Whats the worst that can happen? Oh no! Oh dear the colors! Theyre merging and <faints>

[STALL WARNING, STALL WARNING] [ALTITUDE, ALTITUDE] [PULL UP, PULL UP] "Oh no-"

Stalling out while 100m above the deck and trying to evade twenty missiles.

I'll pull on the brakes and they will fly right by.

Finding a nice place to play.

“I mean, it’s just a magic xylophone, what could possibly go wrong?”

Going to an Open Cockpit Day at your local air museum.

Ill only be there an hour or two. <8 hours later> Sir, SIR the museum is closing. You can come back tomorrow.

existing as a non standard newtonian substance.

Trying to animate with a digital software.

"I hope there are no viruses in this downloaded clip"

Using cheats to hack KSP

I am sure that if I cheat at KSP rather than put in the effort to learn and achieve my own milestones, that I will still find it challenging and engaging a year from now, rather than get bored in a week and go back to mindless FPS.

Dodging 502s.
